p: Assays of antiviral activity and cytotoxicity were evaluated by the modified sulforhodamine B (SRB) assay previously described and recently reported by Choi et al [ 18- 20]. Ribavirin was purchased from DUCHEFA (Netherlands); azidothymidine, acyclovir, amantadine, and lamivudine were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA), as was SRB.
